text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide hl7.fhir.be.terminology

BETerminology

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://hl7belgium.org/profiles/fhir/terminology/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.be.terminology

HL7 Belgium terminology Implementation Guide (IG).

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: Basic Laterality
resource.description: Basic Laterality as requested by CIN-NIC, subset of be-vs-body-laterality

resource.name: be-ns-allergy
resource.description: Unique Identifier for Allergies in the Belgian Health Landscape

resource.name: be-ns-belac
resource.description: BELAC Accreditation

resource.name: be-ns-claim-related-claim
resource.description: Claim Related Claim

resource.name: be-ns-cnk-codes
resource.description: Naming System - CNK Product Codes

resource.name: be-ns-cti-extended-code
resource.description: Naming System - CTI Extended Codes

resource.name: be-ns-lab-report-bundle-id
resource.description: Unique Identifier for Lab Report Bundles

resource.name: be-ns-lab-report-diagnostic-report-id
resource.description: Unique Identifier for Lab Report Diagnostic Report

resource.name: be-ns-prescription-ids
resource.description: Naming System - Prescription IDs

resource.name: be-ns-product-package-type
resource.description: Naming System - Product Package Types

resource.name: be-ns-retam
resource.description: Retam code (Belgian subset of LOINC + Albert Code)

resource.name: BeAllergyIntoleranceCode
resource.description: Allergy / intolerance codes as communicated by NIHDI and the FOD Terminology Center. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort.

resource.name: BeCausativeAgent
resource.description: Causative Agents for Allergy (non medication)

resource.name: BeCdCivilState
resource.description: Civil state in Belgium.

resource.name: BeCdContactPerson
resource.description: Contact person in Belgium.

resource.name: BeCdFedCountry
resource.description: FedICT country codes.

resource.name: BeCdHcParty
resource.description: healthcare party in Belgium.

resource.name: BeCivilState
resource.description: Codes supported by eHealth Platform differentiating types of civil state. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort. Whenever possible add a code from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-MaritalStatus for international interoperability but also use https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/core/CodeSystem/CD-CIVILSTATE for the Belgian specific code.

resource.name: BeContactPerson
resource.description: Maximum valuest to define category of a contact person, using the HL7 values and the Belgian CD-CONTACT-PERSON values.

resource.name: BeCSCareLocation
resource.description: Care Location Code System

resource.name: BeCSPartialAgreementValues
resource.description: Partial agreement values

resource.name: BeCSPseudonymizationVersion
resource.description: List of pseudonymization versions that can be used a.o. in the Capabilities Statement

resource.name: BeCSStatusReason
resource.description: Vaccination reason status Code System.

resource.name: BeCSVaccinationConfirmationStatus
resource.description: Vaccination status Code System.

resource.name: BeCSVaccineAdministrationRoute
resource.description: Vaccine Administration Route

resource.name: BeCSVaccineCode
resource.description: Vaccine Code Code System - set of Belgian codes for types of vaccines that are administered

resource.name: BeCSVaccineTargetDisease
resource.description: Vaccine Target Disease Code System - set of Belgian codes for diseases targeted by the vaccines

resource.name: BeExposureRoute
resource.description: Codes to illustrate differentiating types of exposure route. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort.

resource.name: BeNoAllergy
resource.description: Codes as communicated by the FOD Terminology Center differentiating types of no allergies. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort.

resource.name: BeRiskManifestation
resource.description: Codes as communicated by NIHDI and the FPS Terminology Center differentiating types of risk manifestation. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort.

resource.name: BeVSAllergyIntoleranceType
resource.description: Codes as communicated by NIHDI and the FOD Terminology Center differentiating types of allergy intolerance.

resource.name: BeVSCareLocation
resource.description: Care Location Value Set

resource.name: BeVSCdHcParty
resource.description: List of health care parties in Belgium

resource.name: BeVSHolderCode1
resource.description: see http://www.securimed.eu/fr/tiers-payant/codes-dassurabilite

resource.name: BeVSHolderCode2
resource.description: see http://www.securimed.eu/fr/tiers-payant/codes-dassurabilite

resource.name: BeVSPatientRelationshipType
resource.description: Describes the patient relationship type (the relation between the patient and the person implied)

resource.name: BeVSPatientWillScope
resource.description: Patient Will scope Value Set

resource.name: BeVSVaccinationBodySite
resource.description: Vaccination Body Site Value Set

resource.name: BeVSVaccinationConfirmationStatus
resource.description: Vaccination status Value Set

resource.name: BeVSVaccinationProduct
resource.description: Vaccination Product Value Set

resource.name: BeVSVaccinationReasonCode
resource.description: Vaccination reason code Value Set - the reasons for an vaccination

resource.name: BeVSVaccinationStatusReason
resource.description: Vaccination status reason Value Set - the reasons for an vaccination status - typically representing the reason why a vaccination is not performed

resource.name: BeVSVaccineAdministrationRoute
resource.description: Vaccine Administration Route

resource.name: BeVSVaccineCode
resource.description: Vaccine Code Value Set - the types of vaccines that are administered in Belgium

resource.name: BeVSVaccineTargetDisease
resource.description: Vaccine Target Disease Value Set - the types of diseases that targeted by the vaccines

resource.name: Body Site
resource.description: Body Site

resource.name: Body Site CodeSystem
resource.description: Body Site CodeSystem

resource.name: Coded Annotation Type Codes
resource.description: Code System for specific types of coded annotations

resource.name: Coded Annotation Types
resource.description: Value Set for specific types of coded annotations

resource.name: CodeSystem agreement errors
resource.description:
Errors in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the 
NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.) Not all codes are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be.

resource.name: CodeSystem agreement types
resource.description: Agreement types for MyCareNet flows. Not all codes are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be

resource.name: CodeSystem Albert
resource.description: This code system is to identify Albert code

resource.name: CodeSystem annex types
resource.description: Annex types for MyCareNet flows. Not all codes are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be

resource.name: CodeSystem decision values
resource.description:
Decision values in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the 
NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.) The codes are not defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be.

resource.name: CodeSystem message events
resource.description: Message events for MyCareNet flows.Not all codes are defined here, a full list can be found on mycarenet.be

resource.name: CodeSystem NIHDIPhysiotherapyPathology
resource.description: Legal pathology situation codes as defined by NIHDI to be used in the pathology registration flows of MyCareNet. These values are managed by NIHDI. The codes are not defined here. Consult the cookbooks on mycarenet.be for concrete usage instructions.

resource.name: CodeSystem refusal values
resource.description:
Refusal values in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the 
NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.)

resource.name: CodeSystem waiting for information values
resource.description:
Waiting for information values in the agreement flows of MyCareNet. These values were delivered by the 
NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.)

resource.name: CodeSystem: Types of rating provided by the PSS system
resource.description: CodeSystem: Types of rating provided by the PSS system

resource.name: cvko-id
resource.description: Internal id for identification of resource with cvko

resource.name: Dispenser Types
resource.description: Dispenser Types - from hcparty

resource.name: EAgreement errors
resource.description: Errors in the EAgreement flow

resource.name: Insurability code CT1
resource.description: see http://www.securimed.eu/fr/tiers-payant/codes-dassurabilite

resource.name: Insurability code CT2
resource.description: see http://www.securimed.eu/fr/tiers-payant/codes-dassurabilite

resource.name: Laterality
resource.description: Laterality

resource.name: List of possible genders at birth in Belgium
resource.description: BeVSGenderAtBirth

resource.name: Mycarenet Decision Values
resource.description:
Values indicating the type of decision. These values were delivered by the 
NIC(Nationaal Intermutualistisch College)/CIN(Collège Intermutualiste National.)

resource.description: Patient Will Directive CodeSystem. Codes as defined by the NIHDI.

resource.name: Population Screening Follow-up Advice Value Set
resource.description: Possible follow up actions

resource.description: Code System containing the codes for the type of the next invitation (or exclusion of next invitation)

resource.description: Value Set containing the codes for the type of the next invitation (or exclusion of next invitation)

resource.name: Population Screening Type Value Set
resource.description: Value Set with the codes for the type of screening

resource.name: PopulationScreening Body Site Value Set
resource.description: Body site or location on body

resource.description: Result

resource.name: Problem Category
resource.description: Problem Category

resource.name: Problem Category
resource.description: Problem Category

resource.name: Problem Code
resource.description: Problem Code. No Belgian standardized valueset is yet defined, this is expected   for a future iteration. Implementers are encouraged to use a codification system of their choosing.

resource.name: Problem Origin Type
resource.description: Problem Origin Type

resource.name: Problem Origin Type
resource.description: Problem Origin Type

resource.name: Reaction Manifestation Code
resource.description: Reaction Manifestation Code (Allergy - Immunization)

resource.name: Score Category
resource.description: Score Category

resource.name: Score Category Value Set
resource.description: Score Category Value Set

resource.name: Score Code System
resource.description: Codes as defined initially by the NIHDI. Dutch translations were not yet defined but are planned   for a next release.

resource.name: Score Value Set
resource.description: Codes as defined by the NIHDI. Dutch translations are expected for a next release.

resource.name: Tooth Number Body Site
resource.description: Tooth Number Body Site

resource.name: Types of pseudonymization
resource.description: The technique used for pseudonymization

resource.name: Types of pseudonymization
resource.description: The technique used for pseudonymization

resource.name: Types of rating provided by the PSS system
resource.description: ValueSet - Types of rating provided by the PSS system

resource.name: ValueSet adjudication reason
resource.description: Codes for use to describe eAgreement adjudication reasons in the MyCareNet eAgreement flows.

resource.name: ValueSet message
resource.description: Codes for use to describe eAgreement messages in the MyCareNet eAgreement flows.

resource.name: ValueSet product or service
resource.description: NIHDI codes for use to describe eAgreement products or services in the MyCareNet eAgreement flows.
